name: ktapi
description: A Javascript API to access kadcontrade

scripts.custom-rollup: metascript src/index.js $META_PARAMS >src/processedIndex.js && rollup -c -i src/processedIndex.js -o target/${FILENAME:-ktapi-custom.js} && rm src/processedIndex.js
scripts.interactive-rollup: node interactiveBuild.js && META_PARAMS=$(cat target/settings) npm run custom-rollup

author: 125m125
